arts.ttl: Aston Villa hosts Maccabi Tel Aviv amid boosted security in Europa League
arts.sum: Maccabi fans are banned from the game after West Midlands Police deemed the match at Villa Park to be high risk and cited violence and hate crimes that took place when Maccabi Tel Aviv played at Ajax in Amsterdam last season . Aston Villa meets Maccabi Tel Aviv in the Europa League on Thursday amid boosted security measures including more than 700 police officers.

arts.ttl: Schools close early amid crowd trouble fears at Aston Villa v Maccabi Tel Aviv match
arts.sum: The tensions have led to a decision to ban Israeli fans and keep the away stands empty for the duration of the game

arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs Maccabi Tel Aviv – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Aston Villa will be aiming to get their UEFA Europa League campaign back on track when they host a struggling Maccabi Tel Aviv at Villa Park on Thursday. arts.sum: Aston Villa return to European action on Thursday, aiming to bounce back from a run of two consecutive defeats. The visit of Maccabi Tel Aviv offers a perfect opportunity for Unai Emery’s side to get back to winning ways. Furthermore, this match marks exactly three years since Emery took charge of the club. arts.ttl: Maccabi Tel Aviv boss Zarko Lazetic sad to see fans banned for Aston Villa match
arts.sum: The Israeli club’s supporters were banned from attending Villa Park by Birmingham’s Safety Advisory Group due to fears over their safety.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery focuses on football before politically-charged Maccabi Tel Aviv game
arts.sum: The Israeli club’s supporters were banned from attending due to fears over their safety.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs Maccabi Tel Aviv: Protests, no away fans and 700 police
arts.sum: West Midlands Police said the game has been classified as "high risk" having carried out a "thorough" assessment "based on current intelligence and previous incidents, including violent clashes and hate crime offences that occurred during the 2024 Europa League match between Ajax and Maccabi Tel Aviv in Amsterdam." Last month, Maccabi Tel Aviv fans were banned from attending Thursday's Europa League game against Aston Villa at Villa Park due to safety concerns, which drew immediate criticism from politicians, including Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs Maccabi Tel Aviv predictions: Villa unlikely to cut loose
arts.sum: Aston Villa are rightly favourites to beat Maccabi Tel Aviv at Villa Park on Thursday but Tom McGarry does not expect the hosts to blow their visitors away.
